name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 55: Ghost farts

content.html:
Dear Internet, On this weeks show we talk about a grandpa’s bad influence, blaming your farts on ghosts, and mental health checks. Stay gold, XOXO We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
